cells.content:
HSET company name 'Concrete Go' age 1915 industry material revenue 5.3

HGET company revenue

HEXISTS company name // 1 = true
HEXISTS company x // 0 = false

HDEL company age // delete property in a hash hey

HDEL company age revenue // delete multiple properties

HGETALL company

DEL company // delete the whole hash

HGETALL company
